resources:
RethinkDNS rethink About Settings Internet Manager Awarded MVP Lab funding Taking a nap… A highly customizable DNS and firewall. Detect and block network security threats. Tip: A firewall prevents apps from accessing the Internet over Wi-Fi or mobile data. Most forms of surveillance requires sending data over to a central repository, so firewalling them effectively mitigates the threat. \n\nThere\'s a class of apps that require Internet connection all day, and those are usually communication apps like FairMail and messenger apps like Conversations. Firewalling them might not be an option, and that\'s why we built content blockers. Auto-remove and Auto-grant Auto-revoke Do nothing Home Ready to set DNS-based content blocker. Content blocker no longer in effect. RethinkDNS uses accessibility service to detect and firewall background apps. RethinkDNS does not collect or sell any info. RethinkDNS Next Skip Finish Welcome Monitor network activity, bypass Internet censorship, and firewall apps on your Android device. Libre (and gratis) RethinkDNS is software you can use, study, change and share. Cloudflare Cloudflare family Cloudflare Security RethinkDNS Basic (default) Custom RethinkDNS Plus RethinkDNS Plus RDNS Plus https://cloudflare-dns.com/dns-query https://family.cloudflare-dns.com/dns-query https://security.cloudflare-dns.com/dns-query https://basic.bravedns.com/1:IAAgAA== https://cloudflare-dns.com/ https://basic.bravedns.com/ DNS over HTTPS DNSCrypt DNS Proxy Network DNS Google Cloudflare Quad9 8.8.8.8 1.1.1.1 9.9.9.9 Allow Block Block (unmetered) Block (metered) Bypass Universal Exclude Warning: RethinkDNS is off. Tap to change the protection setting. Protected. Connected to fast and secure DNS. Protected. Connected to fast and secure DNS. Protected. Connected to firewall. Protected. Connected to DNS + firewall. Paused! Blocked apps will continue to be firewalled. Waiting… Failing… Your device is offline. Intra is waiting for a network connection. RethinkDNS has detected another VPN on your device. If you turn on Rethink, that VPN will be turned off. RethinkDNS is not as secure as a trusted VPN. Warning: Queries are failing. You may want to choose a different server or restart Intra. Starting… Intra is establishing a server connection… Protected. protected with tor protected with private DNS protected with Tor and private DNS protected with proxy and private DNS protected with SOCKS5 and private DNS protected with HTTP proxy and private DNS protected with SOCKS proxy protected with HTTP proxy protected with proxy Your connection is protected from DNS attacks. Your connection is currently protected by Android private DNS, but an attacker could turn off or undermine this protection. Private DNS is on. RethinkDNS has detected that the Android Private DNS setting is on. This means your DNS queries are already protected, so there\'s no need to turn on RethinkDNS. Not protected. Your connection is exposed to DNS attacks. Connected to RethinkDNS Connected to firewall Connected to RethinkDNS and firewall. Disconnected from RethinkDNS and firewall. Block apps or a category of apps from connecting to the Internet in response to device events: Limiting access to the Internet helps prevent unwarranted data usage as well as conserves battery. Check which apps consume your data. Streamline your Android smartphone or tablet. Quickly and easily uninstall multiple unwanted applications. View DNS queries this device has requested. Typically, one request is sent for each Internet connection established by any app: For example, loading a web page can result in tens of DNS queries. Keep tabs on incoming and outgoing Internet traffic. RethinkDNS firewall keeps track of connections an app makes to various endpoints on the Internet when on. Block apps from connecting to the Internet. Limiting access to the Internet helps prevent unwarranted data usage, as well as conserve battery. Apply firewall rules on all apps based on device events, for example, firewall when the device is locked or when a particular app is not in use. Whitelisted apps are exempt from all firewall rules. All connections to these IPs are blocked for all apps except the ones in the whitelist. DNS Firewall DNS + firewall @drawable/spinner_dns @drawable/spinner_firewall @drawable/spinner_both Resume Pause Stop DNS DNS + firewall DNS Network Rules Firewall \u0009 Firewall select apps from connecting to the Internet.\n\u0009 Monitor the network activity of all apps.\n\u0009 (May use extra battery.) Monitor network activity and firewall any app or IP address. DNS + Firewall \u0009 Circumvent Internet censorship.\n\u0009 Prevent DNS manipulation attacks with encrypted DNS.\n\u0009 First line of defence against malware and other security threats.\n\u0009 Monitor DNS traffic. Monitor, block, and encrypt DNS requests. All of the above + bypass Internet censorship. Coming soon. Permission — Accessibility Action Required RethinkDNS uses accessibility service to track which apps are in use (foreground), as opposed to not (background).\n\nRethinkDNS does not collect any info or spy on you. The RethinkDNS accessibility service has stopped or crashed. Go to the settings and force-stop RethinkDNS and start it again to use the Block any app not in use feature.\n\nRethinkDNS uses the accessibility service to track which apps are in use (foreground), as opposed to not (background). Could not open the accessibility settings. Please try again later. Start Firewall / DNS + firewall to configure apps. Start DNS / DNS + firewall to view logs Choose Mode. Choose Mode. Start firewall / DNS + firewall to view network logs. https://www.bravedns.com/faq RDNS Default Does not block any DNS requests. Uses Cloudflare\'s 1.1.1.1 DNS endpoint. Blocks malware and adult content. Uses Cloudflare\'s 1.1.1.3 DNS endpoint. Blocks malicious content. Uses Cloudflare\'s 1.1.1.2 DNS endpoint. Blocks malware and more. Uses RethinkDNS\'s non-configurable basic endpoint. Set your own custom DNS over HTTPS endpoint. Configurable DNS endpoint: Provides in-depth analytics of your Internet traffic, allows you to set custom rules and more. Could not connect to host. Try again. Invalid URL New custom DNS endpoint added. Delete all network logs? This only deletes network logs but not firewall rules. This operation is not reversible. Do you want to proceed? Delete all DNS logs? This deletes on-device DNS logs. This operation is not reversible. Do you want to proceed? Blocked connections All connections Blocked connections All connections Kill app App Info Clear all rules Block all apps from connecting to this IP Block, bypass this IP for this app Block, bypass, exclude this app blocked %1$s by %2$s blocked %1$s on device allowed on %1$s/%2$s %3$s.\u0020 blocked on %1$s/%2$s %3$s allowed on %1$s %2$s blocked on %1$s %2$s No rules #1: Blocks an app from connecting to the Internet. \n #2: Blocks any app from connecting to a particular IP. \n #3: Blocks all connections when device locked (universal firewall). \n #4: Blocks any app not in use (universal firewall). \n #5: Blocks connections when source app unknown (universal firewall). \n #6: Blocks all UDP traffic except DNS (universal firewall). \n #7: Block connections when DNS is bypassed (universal firewall). Whitelisted: Whitelisted text. \n Proxied: Proxied text. All rules related to this app will be cleared Clear rules All rules related to this app is cleared Whitelisted apps cannot be blocked. Excluded apps cannot be blocked. Private DNS has been set. Disable Always-on VPN \"Always-On VPN\" is turned on. To start Rethink, please go to Settings app and turn off \"Always-on VPN\". Go to Settings Cancel Always-on VPN Stop Rethink despite \"Always-on VPN\" being turned on for it? Stop RethinkDNS even though it is running VPN in lockdown mode (which would result in loss of Internet connectivity on this user profile)? Stop Cancel Settings Block System Apps Block System Components Block Non-App System Block %1$s Some %1$s are critical to proper functioning of a device. Do not block them if you don\'t know what you are doing. Block anyway Cancel Universal All Apps Network Logs Configure Logs Delete IP Rule? Delete this rule, allowing any app to connect to this IP? No IPs found. Tap on entries in the network log screen to block individual IP addresses. Delete DoH endpoint? Delete the DNS over HTTPS endpoint from saved configuration. Endpoint deleted. Delete DNSCrypt resolver? Delete the DNSCrypt resolver from saved configuration. DNSCrypt resolver deleted. Delete DNSCrypt Relay? Delete the DNSCrypt relay from saved configuration. DNSCrypt Relay deleted. Delete DNS Proxy? Delete the DNS proxy from saved configuration. DNS Proxy deleted. Configure RethinkDNS Plus Configure RethinkDNS Plus to block adult content, dating and gambling websites, malware, spyware and more. Download Blacklists Download blacklists (around 60 MB) to use this feature? Action required Cannot download or update blacklists when VPN is in lockdown mode. Turn it off from the VPN settings. VPN settings Cancel Already using the latest version You have the latest version (v%1$s) of all on-device blacklists. OK Already using the latest version You have the latest version (v%1$s) of all on-device blacklists. OK Download again Re-download blacklists Something went wrong! Please download the blacklists (around 60 MB) again. Re-download Cancel Something went wrong. Try again later. You have the latest version of all on-device blacklists. You have the latest version of all remote blacklists. You have the latest version of all blacklists. Quit? Quit with %1$s blacklist(s) in use and no additional blacklists set? Quit (with no changes made to the current configuration)? Error Something went wrong. Please try again later. App list re-synced. Set up a DNS proxy by clicking on the \"Add\" button below. Connection logging off. Turn it on again by going to Settings and turn on On-device logging. DNS request logging off. Turn it on again by going to Settings and turn on On-device logging. Also blocks proxy and VPN domains used to bypass the filters. Mixed content sites (like Reddit) are also blocked. Google, Bing and YouTube are set to the safe mode. Protects your device from malware and more. AdGuard DNS with safe-search and adult content blocking. Block access to phishing, malware, and malicious domains. (Does not block adult content.) Quad9 (anycast) DNSSEC/no-log/filter 9.9.9.9 / 149.112.112.9 Netherlands France Sweden US — Los Angeles, CA Singapore sdns://gRI1MS4xNS4xMjQuMjA4OjQzNDM sdns://gREyMTIuMTI5LjQ2LjMyOjQ0Mw sdns://gRMxMjguMTI3LjEwNC4xMDg6NDQz sdns://gRAyMy4xOS42Ny4xMTY6NDQz sdns://gRMxNzQuMTM4LjI5LjE3NToxNDQz Anonymized DNS relay hosted in Netherlands. Anonymized DNS relay hosted in US — Los Angeles, CA provided by https://cryptostorm.is/. Anonymized DNS relay hosted in Singapore. DNS over HTTPS DNSCrypt DNS Proxy Connected to %1$s DNSCrypt: %1$s resolvers whitelisted app excluded app Logs not captured when connected to DNS Proxy. Set HTTP(S) Proxy HTTP(S) proxy settings are only a hint to apps, but they may or may not use it; however, web browsers like Chrome and Firefox do use these. Apps using the HTTP(S) proxy will bypass both firewall and DNS rules. There is a new version of the app. Download it from the website? You are running tha latest version. And everything is good in the world. Something went wrong! Either the Rethink servers are down, or the connection could not be established. Please try again later. Can\'t update right now The update cannot be executed right now. Please try again later. Search apps, IPs, domains Search apps Search domain names or IPs Search IPs Search domain names Search blacklists DNS (battery saver) DNS Firewall DNS and firewall (default) VPN VPN VPN and proxy (off) IP address copied. URL copied Copied as RDNS + DNS over HTTPS URL Store DNS and Firewall logs locally on the device. On-device logging Choose mode Cannot start the VPN. 2021 Happy New Year DNS (off) (off) Cannot block the app What\'s new in v053i 🌎🕊 International Day of Friendship (30 July) 🕊🌎 Internet Protocol Version 6\n\n 1. IPv6 support.\n\n 2. Per app IP blacklists.\n\n 3. New firewall rule: Block port 80 (insecure HTTP) traffic.\n\n 4. New firewall rule: Block connections on metered (mobile) network.\n\n 5. New feature: Connect to System or Network provided DNS.\n\n 6. New feature: Block connections over metered (mobile) and unmetered (Wi-Fi) networks.\n\n 7. New feature: Per app network report card.\n\n 8. New feature: Add IP addresses or IP subnet ranges as firewall rules.\n\n 9. UI overhaul for Firewall and DNS screens.\n\n 10. All-new network engine.\n\n Firewall Kill app when firewalled (experimental) Some stubborn apps persistently try to connect to the Internet even when firewalled. Turn on this setting to kill such apps. Exclude apps from firewall and DNS Connections from excluded apps will not monitored or blocked. Choose IP version Choose between Internet protocol versions. Force IPv4 egress Translate outbound IPv6 traffic to IPv4 on-device. Use this if you are connected to an IPv4-only network. Allow Bypass Allow requesting apps to bypass the RethinkDNS firewall on-demand. Some audio/video conference apps like Zoom and WhatsApp may require an on-demand bypass to function properly. "Disabled. Settings->VPN->Block connections without VPN" is on for RethinkDNS, enabling the feature will block the internet connection of the apps which are trying to bypass the VPN. Cannot allow bypass, or set up proxies when VPN is running in lockdown mode. Go to VPN settings. Proxy Set up SOCKS5 (TCP) Proxy Forward connections to SOCKS5 endpoint. Set up HTTP(S) Proxy This setting is only a recommendation and apps may ignore it. Apps using HTTP(S) proxy will bypass both the firewall and DNS rules. Orbot TCP-only Proxy Forwards all TCP connections to Orbot. HTTP Proxy Recommends that apps use Orbot\'s HTTP proxy. TCP + HTTP Proxy All of the above. None (default) None of the above. Forwarding TCP connections to Orbot. HTTP Proxy is set (apps may ignore it). Forwarding TCP to Orbot, HTTP Proxy also set. One-click Tor-as-a-Proxy (Orbot) setup. Could not launch Orbot. Is it installed? Setting up Orbot… Manually Stop Orbot RethinkDNS has stopped forwarding connections to Orbot, but Orbot may be running in the background. Stop Orbot Dismiss Orbot and Proxies Orbot is a libre (and gratis) proxy app that lets other apps use the Internet more securely. \nOrbot uses Tor to encrypt your Internet traffic, which helps you bypass censorship and defend against forms of network surveillance threatening personal freedom and privacy. \nTCP Proxy: RethinkDNS forwards only TCP connections of all but excluded apps to Orbot. \nHTTP Proxy: RethinkDNS sets HTTP proxy but does not enforce that the apps use it. Usually, web browsers like Chrome and Firefox do use it. Apps using HTTP(S) proxy will bypass both firewall and DNS rules. Start Stop cancel Install Orbot? Orbot brings the features and functionality of Tor to Android. Install Install from playstore Install from F-Droid Install from website Dismiss website https://guardianproject.info/apps/org.torproject.android/ https://github.com/guardianproject/orbot/releases Something went wrong. Try again later. Set up Orbot Orbot\t\u276F Orbot in non-VPN mode with HTTPS/SOCKS5. Tap here to install Orbot. Orbot one touch setup — SOCKS5 Enable Orbot in non-VPN mode. Tap the Orbot icon to set it up. Forwarding the connections to Orbot… SOCKS5 proxy is turned on. Turn off to continue with one-touch setup. Connected to Orbot. Turn it off to continue. Start RethinkDNS to proceed. Orbot is not started. Try again later. Turn off HTTP(S) and/or SOCKS5 proxy to continue with a Tor-as-a-proxy setup. Connected to Orbot. Turn it off to continue. Action required Could not start Tor-as-a-proxy. Open the Orbot app to start it manually. Orbot — Starting Tor-as-a-proxy failure notification… Open Orbot general Refresh Data Re-sync the app list. Auto-start on power-up (experimental) On device power-up, start RethinkDNS if it was running before shutdown. Use all available networks (experimental) When on, RethinkDNS uses all available networks to connect to Internet. If not, it uses any network is deemed active by Android. Attention! App firewall rules for metered (Wi-Fi) and non-metered (mobile) will not be honoured. Turn on anyway Cancel Re-syncing… Re-synced. Look for new versions of the app Check once a week. Use in-app downloader Otherwise Android\'s built-in download manager is used. Turn on firewall mode. Block apps View logs Off Latency: %1$sms Turn on DNS mode. Change Start Stop (Active since %1$s; protos: %2$s.) (Inactive since %1$s.) Attention! Grant RethinkDNS permission to set up a local VPN to encrypt the device\'s DNS requests, implement a network monitor, and enforce firewall rules. \n\nRethinkDNS does not collect any info or spy on you. Proceed Cancel VPN connection cancelled. Did you configure another VPN to be always-on? Start %1$s You are one step away from a safer and more secure Android: Instantly see network activity, blacklist websites, IPs, and badly behaving apps. More DNS options Select or add more options from DoH, DNSCrypt, DNS proxy. Show website icon in DNS logs (experimental) Fetches website icons from duckduckgo.com. Prevent DNS leaks When on, RethinkDNS captures all packets on port 53 and forwards it to a user-set DNS endpoint. Ask when updating blacklist Check for blacklist updates once every three days. Download blacklist (around 2 KB) to use this feature? Download Configure Dismiss Look for new version? RethinkDNS is the easiest way to monitor app activity, circumvent Internet censorship, and firewall apps on your Android device. RethinkDNS is a libre (and gratis) project, led by ex-engineers from Amazon, IBM, and Scientific Games. help and feedback E-mail crash logs. Telegram Bug report Bug report Send e-mail Cancel Bug report Could not fetch crash logs. Report the bug manually? Send e-mail Cancel links Visit rethinkdns.com Contribute on GitHub View FAQs Read the blog Read the documentation Contact Sponsor Sponsor the RethinkDNS project. App E-mail us System App info VPN profile Notification settings What\'s new in %1$s Follow us on Twitter RethinkDNS was awarded MVP Lab funding. No rule App blocked Unmetered (Wi-Fi) Metered (Mobile) Metered (Universal) New App Error IP Blocked Priv IP (app) Priv IP Device Locked App not in use Source app unknown UDP blocked DNS bypassed Priv app DNS proxied Orbot set up Insecure HTTP No firewall rules matched this connection. A user-set firewall rule blocked this app.

Change this by going to the All apps tab. A user-set firewall rule blocked this app when trying to connect on an unmetered network.

Change this by going to the All Apps tab. A user-set firewall rule blocked this app when trying to connect on a metered network.

Change this by going to the All Apps tab. A user-set universal firewall rule blocked this app when trying to connect on a metered (mobile) network.

Change this by going to the Universal tab. This connection was firewalled because RethinkDNS is seeing this app for the first time.

Change this behaviour by going to the Universal tab. RethinkDNS could not apply firewall rules. This connection was blocked as a result. A user-set firewall rule blocked the destination IP.

Change this by going to the Universal tab. This connection was allowed because the destination IP is set to bypass all app-specific rules.

Change this by going to the App-specific Firewall screen. This connection was allowed because the destination IP is set to bypass all universal firewall rules.

Change this by going to the IP Rules in Universal tab. This connection was firewalled because the device was locked at the time.

Change this by going to the Universal tab. This connection was firewalled because the source app was not in the foreground.

Change this by going to the Universal tab. This connection was firewalled because the source app could not be determined.

To change this by going to the Universal tab. A user-set firewall rule blocked this UDP connection.

Change this by going to the Universal tab. This connection was blocked because the source app bypassed user-preferred DNS.
